author: David Brock
title: Democrats can't play nice if Trump's coronavirus failures are to mean anything
description: Trump is no "wartime president" and there's no need for Democrats to buy into his act and excuse his egregious failures to act in time to save Americans' lives.
content: Before COVID-19 made it to U.S. shores, Donald Trumps re-election was dangling by wire: He was down in theswing states needed for electoral victory,suburban women had squarely moved away from his column and his efforts to dismantle theAffordable Care Act were… [+5009 chars]
